render.notes: The central map visualization uses CSS shapes and gradients to approximate the 3D arrows from the original screenshot. The fonts are approximated using system fonts and 'Arial Black' for the heavy display text. The 3D rendered icons (heart, eyes) are represented by emojis within styled containers to maintain performance and portability while keeping the visual hierarchy.
